name: Alphacross Blast Trail Running Shoes - Men's

features: Ripstop Fabric: Woven fabrics, often made of Nylon, with reinforcement to resist tearing, ripping and abrasion
Energy Cell: A high performance Eva foam that provides shock attenuation
Contagrip® TD: For maximum traction on mixed terrain and extended durability, Contagrip® TD combines a deep, aggressive lug pattern with our most durable compound
